name: Refrigerator LG GBB62DSHMN Inox
origAbout: Premium and Compact Design. Elegant and Practical Minimalism. The new bottom freezer is the epitome of refinement in both function and style. It has a minimalist design that maximizes elegance and convenience. Now, enjoy both practicality and luxury in your own kitchen. LinearCooling™ reduces temperature fluctuations, locking in the flavor of fresh for up to 7 days. Drinks are colder and food stays fresher with the even and faster performance of DoorCooling+™. The LG Inverter Linear Compressor helps maintain the appearance and taste of fresh products for longer by reducing temperature fluctuations.
